vbar 0.1-0
  • Reference

    Build Macro Script

    macro_script.Rd

    Build a VBS script that calls the macro specified macro.

    macro_script(macro_file, macro_name, ..., .skeleton = default_skeleton())

    Arguments

    macro_file

    The file containing the macro. Currently, ".xls*" and ".doc*" files are supported.

    macro_name

    The name of the macro.

    ...

    Arguments to pass to the macro. Type conversions in the resulting VBScript are defined based on the R class of each argument as follows:

    • numeric: cast to double using Cdbl()

    • integer: cast to integer using CInt()

    • character: cast to string using CStr()

    .skeleton

    Path to the skeleton VBScript. See default_skeleton() for more information.

    Value

    A character string containing VBScript text.

    Examples

    if (FALSE) {
example_file = system.file("examples", "data_importer.xlsm",
  package = "vbar")
macro_script(example_file, "importData",
  inputFile = NA_character_, targetSheet = NA_character_,
  targetRange = NA_character_, outputFile = NA_character_)
}
